data.name: The Man in the Cape: Special Edition
data.detailed_description:
Special Edition

Originally released in October 15th, 2012, The Man in the Cape has been updated and improved for release on Steam. The Special Edition includes:

  • Support for popular 16:9 resolutions, from 720p to 4k.
  • A better game foundation, including a much higher framerate.
  • A number of rendering, input, text, art, bug, and crash fixes.
  • The game has been completely rebalanced for a more enjoyable experience.
  • Steam Achievements have been added.


About the Game

Gameplay


The Man in the Cape: Special Edition is a twin stick, run-and-gun, arcade-style shooter. The Man in the Cape must blast his way past hordes of creatures, room to room, in a quest to escape from Mr. Granderson's nefarious superhero elimination dungeon!

  • Over 60 Rooms of Terror: Challenge yourself in Mr. Granderson's dungeon. It spans 60+ rooms, filled to the brim with vile, nanotech infused monstrosities! Be the superhero mankind deserves!

  • Overcome Mr. Granderson's Supervillain Army: Encounter nanotech infused bugs, sad robots, former armyman-turned-bad guys, and even an angry Pill Bug in Granderson's elimination dungeon!

  • Use Guns and Gold: Pick up dropped weapons to give The Man in the Cape a boost of firepower! Collect mountains of silver and gold to buy upgrades to give yourself superhuman speed and endurance!

  • Terrifyingly Strange Boss Battles: Pit yourself in a fight to the death against a stomach virus, a burning woman, and a man wearing a fireplace rug as a cape in oddly staged boss battles!

Story


Mr. Granderson, the owner of Granderson Electronics Repair, is a simple businessman. He works hard and keeps to himself. But somehow, his building has become a magnet for superheroes, who feel the need to stand on his roof to cast an eye over their beloved city.

Having had enough, Mr. Granderson concocted a plan for revenge. In a form never seen before, Mr. Granderson then constructed a vast underground superhero elimination dungeon to trap all those who seek to trespass on his property. It was only a matter of time before Granderson would find success, having trapped popular "superhero" The Man in the Cape!

With a "take no prisoners" pledge, The Man in the Cape must now fight against the dungeon's horde of nanotech driven creatures and bring Mr. Granderson to justice!

data.short_description: In retaliation for using his roof as a city lookout point, The Man in the Cape is captured and left for dead in Mr. Granderson's superhero elimination dungeon. To escape, the determined Capeman must blast his way past Granderson's horde of malcontents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
  • Additional Notes: A CONTROLLER IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Minimum 1280x720 screen resolution required.
